channel.title: Loading moparscape: please help! im dieing to play!
channel.description:
[b][size=10pt]Hi,
Im new to moparscape and i need some help loading it. Ive downloaded the cache, ive got the latest java (jre1.5.0_11 and jre1.6.0_01), ive extracted the files and ive downloaded the client. When i click the runmoparscape.bat file as i use windows xp, when i do, its comes up with a black box then it comes up with moparscape for like 2 seconds then it dissapears and comes up with a black box saying... "Press any key to continue". Can anyone help me? When I get time, i will post a video of it. The person that fixes my problem will be the server that I will join regularly. I really want to play moparscape. Its sounds awesome.
[color=green]Thanks, Jemage[/size][/b]

item.title: Loading moparscape: please help! im dieing to play!
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

  1. You need JDK
  2. Download MoparScape
  3. Open it and let it load
  4. Find a server on the server status page and play it

Read full topic

item.title: Loading moparscape: please help! im dieing to play!
item.dc:creator: @Jemage Jemage
item.description:
@Jemage wrote:

ive done the web cleint and it went off but im doign the desktop client thing now…[br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2007, 02:14:43 AM[/size][hr]i tried both.

results:

  1. disappeared as ive already downloaded the thing from there.
  2. does the same thing (press any key to continue)

ive got the client. when i run it it runs for 2 secs then says press any key to continue. anyone else help me?? im open to all suggestions. im really dieing to play!! remember the reward
